bike.description: Specialized A1 Premium Aluminum, fully manipulated 700c sloping commuter frame, integrated headset, forged drop outs w/ replaceable hanger, disc only

KMC X9, 1/2" x 3/32" w/ reusable Missing Link

RST Vouge Comp, Cr-Mo stanchions, alloy steerer, Mag lower, coil sping w/ hydraulic LO
